website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an electric bike conversion kit with a front wheel and speedy operation, this is the one to choose.
pros: Offers a speedy ride once installed, thanks to the 48-volt 1,000-watt motor
Front wheel includes a durable tire
Kit comes with a manual and LCD display for tracking speed, battery power, mileage, and more
cons: Price is a bit higher than others on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: people stare at me like they dont get It
customer_reviews.text: I live In the Appelation area.PA. lots of really steep hills.have not found one paved I could not climb yet.long and steep.keeps up with traffic.people stare at me like they dont get It.I was told not to use a beach cruiser model with coaster brake system and did It anyway.no regrets.did hook up brake system without cables for motor cutoff In case of throttle sticks[not likely].didnt hook up peddle asits.I love It.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: love this bike
customer_reviews.text: i buy this kit 7 mouths ago i am 168 lbs flat ground 42 mpr climb hills down hills 56 mpr so far miles 2618 miles on it the one thing i change on the battery is the fuse the fuse holder from the factory was getting hot smoking you smell it the wire on the fuse was to small i open up the battery cut out the fuse went to auto store got thicker fuse kit put the same amp in it made battery last and feel stronger love it
customer_reviews.author: albert bridges

customer_reviews.title: This wheel is phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is phenomenal i've had it for a couple of months and I've gone 705 miles on it I live in Los Angeles California and this is a great way to get around town
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Fast and is pretty much weather proof .road for a couple miles in pooring rain never effected it and that was a month or so go and if got caught in the rain twice since still nothing is stopping this conversion kit ... side note I did not let the controller get wet so that's important
customer_reviews.author: HOLLIS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, top speed with 48 volt 18 amp hour battery was 28 mph. In my opinion too fast. I will limit the top speed to 15 mph through the LCD display. Need to install a torque arm on front wheel, motor has a lot of torque and will spin the axle out of the forks. Also, If your not careful the front wheel will spin in the gravel. Excellent quality of parts.
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Nabors

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!! Put this on my full suspension bike. I'm 200lbs, and the bike is a typical aluminum bike. I get up to 35mph. No joke. Down side, had to lose ny front disc brake. The hub motor was to wide and rubbed the brake caliper. I wasn't able to adjust it away. But...oh well still super fun. Easier to install then you might think. I have a 48v 20ah battery and I get really good range
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Durable and a lifesaver for someone who can't drive
customer_reviews.text: So I've had it since July 2016, and I absolutely love it! I have traveled a total of 1,050 mi with it and has been a lifesaver since I lost my license due to my second DUI. The installation instructions could be explained a little better, but anyone tech savvy can figure it out easily. Totally paid for itself 100 times over.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Nickliss

customer_reviews.title: Strong Motor & Never gives Up, The LED display is Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I put 400 miles on this system in 1 month thinking these things wont hold up, I was totally wrong. This motor kit from AW had everything you need to get e-biking in little time, everything is plug & play after getting everything installed &wired up. Nice little LCD display is a must have feature. Coupled to my 48v 20ah battery it pulls at 23 mph for hours, peddle faster & your going 25, down small hill goes 32 easily. Has had zero problems going up mild hills at 16 mph no peddling.
customer_reviews.author: John Manley

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Affordable, Reliable E-bike Conversion kit
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ebike conversion. I took my 25-year-old Trek mountain bike and converted using this kit. It was fairly easy and straight forward but I must admit that I was a little nervous since I didn't feel like there were adequate instructions for installing all the components. But there are plenty of people on youtube that have done their own DIY ebike conversions..and I would highly recommend watching them before you begin. The front hub motor makes a humming noise when power is applied to the hub motor. I live in San Francisco where we have lots of hills which makes riding a bike challenging..but NOT any more!. The 1000 watt motor is perfect for this city.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Yes, installing it is a big project, but the result was well worth it. I love riding and exploring again. I now do an 18 mile commute to work by riding through the parks, beautiful! So much better than fighting traffic. Only real problem was that the PAS sensor was too wide so I had to buy another and rewire it. I wish this kit, especially the controller had more documentation. Parameter settings, wire outs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Shouldice

customer_reviews.title: The wheel is great I am installing it on a Merax Tricycle
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is great I am installing it on a Merax Tricycle. I changed the center of gravity by moving the seat down and backward. That madea space for the battery and other components. My wife has put 10 miles on the trike with the wheel on it and likes the changes i will finish the instalation and post again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Good eBike Conversion kit
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this kit twice; first for my wife's bike, and then three months later for mine. Google front wheel ebike reviews and this one shows up highly rated. My only comments would be to add an additional wrap of electrical tape around the wires where you are tie wrapping them. The insulation cover is pretty soft, and any type of abrasion can wear through them. I've got EGO batteries for yard tools and set up a battery adapter to use them, and its been working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Midlomac

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, works well,  but seller didn’t respond to email questions
customer_reviews.text: Converted a Walmart bike with this kit. PROS: (1)Very easy to install. (2)Works well. CONS: (1)The integrated PAS sensor would not fit on my bike. However, I can ride no problems without it installed. I would have liked to have the PAS. (2)The seller does not answer emails. I sent 3 while I was converting my bike, including a question about the PAS and whether or not they might have something that would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Customer

customer_reviews.title: SELLER DOES NOT PAY FOR RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: This product did not fit on my sons bike. I scheduled a return to place an order for the correct size. If you order this product they make you pay shipping back to them. Due to the size and weight of the box, it was not worth ordering this product. Just a heads up to purchasers.
customer_reviews.author: Parsley01

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Usually you can tell right away if a product has been engineered well. This company has done it's homework and delivers. The instructions are very detailed and in English. Easy set up just change out front wheel and a couple of connections.
customer_reviews.author: Nena M.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product seems good but I ordered the wrong size and had to return it. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, so far I’ve put 150 miles on it. I’ve went 40 miles on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my Towney and also on my wifes towney. Us two old people can ride again, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin C

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked great. Great value even if the directions could be cleaned up a bit. Put it on a trike for a grandmother and now she is EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.author: Gary F. Haider

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with the wheel 😍
customer_reviews.text: I love my AW front electric wheel I’ve put 1500 miles on it so far and the only bro I’ve had was changing out the spooks that break and one other time the LED screen didn’t come on for like a few hours . But other than that it has been good to me . But I do see that my battery connector cable is coming apart and I would want to know where I can get another one from
customer_reviews.author: TraeVon Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Very good wheel
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is awesome. It was very easy to install and fits perfectly on my bike. The wheel has a great amount of torque and really gets going. I weigh about 215 and my bike is at least 60 and I can still get to 30mph. I have never had a problem with any hill either. If you get a good battery u can easily Cruise at 20mph for at least 20-25 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Arreguin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great way to go biking. You don't have to worry about the wind or the hills. However, only time will tell as to how long it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Kronschnabl

customer_reviews.title: Buy from someone else.
customer_reviews.text: The brakes that came with the product short circuited the motor. I unplugged them and re-installed the original ones. The bike works now, but I'm VERY DISAPPOINTED !
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: How to assemble the darn thing!
customer_reviews.text: Really too soon to judge durability, and the lack of instructions was a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!! Front wheel locked up sending me over the handlebars. This product is dangerous and should not be sold
customer_reviews.author: LAURA G

customer_reviews.title: Eletric bicycle motor
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I should have gotten the shipping charges refunded to me as well
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this set to power up my tricycle and it works great! Nice set up. Everything workes as it should. It was packaged very well absolutely no complainants
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Roehrick

customer_reviews.title: Bust buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quality kit connections wiring everything I plan on using this company in the future I have 90miles on my kit already
customer_reviews.author: Josh sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install disc brake
customer_reviews.text: Disc brake mounting screws where extremely difficult to put on and there was an alignment issue had a bad experience with different brand and wheel so decided to cancel project.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Very good system
customer_reviews.text: I installed in 9 bikes go friends Very easy for me to install and program For some it may need better instructions
customer_reviews.author: Dale Christopherson

customer_reviews.title: AWInternational exceeded my expectation in dealing with a return of defective product
customer_reviews.text: IF these two products: Front and Rear Wheel 48V 1,000 W kits last till spring. I'll be happy to write a positive review. It's all about field testing and the weather.
customer_reviews.author: B. G.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Very complicated, and the Instructions are of little value. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lakatos

customer_reviews.title: They just keep going &going & going  !
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! I’m on wheel # 9 , and will definitely buy more ! They last forever . Strong and durable .
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hoschl

customer_reviews.title: Hooked this up to a Geneis v2100; used a ...
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this up to a Geneis v2100; used a 20ah lithium ion battery. Got about 45 mph on level ground.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Jones

customer_reviews.title: Totally mismatched kit
customer_reviews.text: Kit came with 2 12 volt, 12 AH batteries witch are too large and insufficient power for e-bike. Charger didn’t match kit needs either. Ended up sending wheel and charger back but got stuck with batteries because Amazon wouldn’t let me send them back. Safety issue they say.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mitchem

customer_reviews.title: Interrogated pas does not fit schwinn trike!
customer_reviews.text: Interrogated pas does not fit Schwinn trike. They have no plan to fix this!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to work hooked up wall connections properly charge the battery and nothing
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Gone 120 miles so far.... The spokes needed tightening but whatever no biggie
customer_reviews.author: aaron briggs

customer_reviews.title: This rig is fast!
customer_reviews.text: Problems so far - none. Did my Dad need a bike that can do 50 MPH - nope.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: High quality conversion kit for your bike.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit. I can easily get my bike up to 30 miles per hour and zip up hills with this kit. It was easy to assemble and the controller is comparable to the controllers on $3,000 e-bikes you purchase at a local dealer. Highly recommend this! Make sure you check your bikes current handlebar configuration. This is difficult to install on bikes that have a shifter where you twist the handlebar to shift the bike. You'll want to convert it to a thumb shifter for this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg lantz

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't able to use it. The screen shows battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't able to use it. The screen shows battery is full. The instructions said it needs 48v and the multimeter shows 50.9v from the battery. The screen shows I'm usin the brake and the throttle. When I accelerate the screen shows I'm using the throttle but the tire won't run. Istill waitin for a response to see if I can return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio A. J.

customer_reviews.title: But I am very pleased. The motor and controller work very well
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars because I am totally impressed with the product. However, it came from China and the speedometer / odometer are in metric, whereas those headed for Britten or America are supposed to be in miles. It isn't clear if I was supposed to get some additional options. But I am very pleased. The motor and controller work very well. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Keller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Defective item controller bad replacement part wrong type. Not getting customer service cooperation
customer_reviews.author: vernal martin

customer_reviews.title: forget about electric bicycle kit
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed....the contents of the kit were incomplete, you could have charged more to include necessary parts. the instructions are also very obtuse and non existent
customer_reviews.author: Pat Insco

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to install and good customer service...Good deal for the price...
customer_reviews.author: MarkAKACatfish

customer_reviews.title: Problem with wheel spokes
customer_reviews.text: The motor functions fine; the wheel, however, is fundamentally flawed. The spokes popped out and within an hour the wheel was completely shot.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bartelt

customer_reviews.title: As described quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back on July 3rd delivery was quick been on tandem mountain bike now for approximately 300mi no load on Wheel speedometer shows 43 both me and my wife 28 to 30mph she is 112 lb me190lb so far sooo good also bought the 48v 14 amp power rack battery:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Works better then I expected I rode 5.4 miles today and barely used a bar of energy. Needs to include a rack and a better bag
customer_reviews.author: andrew lobos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a product of outstanding quality I recommend it 100%, I buy again Fast shipping, safe packaging
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Arrived as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Arrived as described. I'm getting 2 24v. Deep cycle batteries. 4 7 ah batteries lasted 11 miles. I will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electrical Engineer's Inspection
customer_reviews.text: Opened the controller and looked up the datasheet for the power MOSFETs, They are designed to run at 63v max, so I bumped my 12s lipo pack to 14s meaning my peak voltage is 58.8v after full charge and I increase my max speed from 50km/h to 55km/h (35mph). Love this thing, rode it over 400 miles so far, and haven't had any issues. Saved about $1000 in gas so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is there a video showing how to install all this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found the kit, to be lacking in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the kit , to be lacking in the need to know information.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as it look . I was disappointed with this
customer_reviews.author: Luis

product_meta.title: AW 26"x1.75" Front Wheel Electric Bicycle Motor Kit 48V 1000W Powerful Motor E-Bike Conversion w/LCD Display
product_meta.description:
Notice: 
Battery and Charger are Not Included.
Battery Recommendation: Electro kinetic cell battery featured in nominal voltage 48v, nominal capacity 12 to 20Ah is compatible with the motor.

Specification:
Overall Dimension: 25 3/16" x 13/16" (64 x 2 cm)
Axle Length: 6 13/16" (17.3 cm)
Front Dropout Spacing: 3 15/16" (10 cm)
Spokes Length: 6 5/16" (16 cm)
The Number of Spokes: 36
Controller Power: 1000W
Motor Power: 1000W
Motor Voltage: 48V
Motor Rotating Speed: 480 RPM
High Motor Efficiency: 80%
Net weight: 24.25 Lbs (11 kg)

Package Content:
1x 26" Front Wheel with Brushless Hub Motor
1x Electric Controller
2x Hand Brakes
1x Twist Throttle
2x Handle Grips
1x LCD Display
1x Pedal Assist Sensor
1x Controller Bag
1x Battery Connection Cable
1x Fuse Accessory
1x Rope
1x Set of Widing Pipe and Cable Tie
1x Manual
feature_bullets: 1000W 48V 26" Electric Bicycle Front Hub Conversion Kit, fit for 3 15/16" front dropout spacing, with a speed of 28 mile/h (45 km/h), make your bicycle an electric power moped, brushless hub motor for noiseless running, to fully enjoy the pleasure of riding.

Dual Mode Controller - Motor works under Hall effect and non-Hall effect, extend life for electric bicycle (If the components break down, controller will switch into non-hall effect mode, the motor will still be working ).

LCD for Data Display - Shows battery condition, speed, distance, PAS, trip time and error codes for troubleshooting, also cruise and assist promotion function can be turned on by operating the LCD display.

Pedal Assist Sensor - To sense your pedal cadence and accordingly adjust motor turning rate, get power assistant without using throttle, great for a long-distance journey, avoid wrist pain from keep pressing Durable Frame - Aluminum alloy frame for durability and stability.

Convenient to Use - Twist Throttle makes speed control as a breeze Hand brakes shut off the motor automatically to save energy and improve safety. Environmental Protection - Powered by battery, without carbon dioxide emissions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
